item.title: Migrating Concourse Resources to S3
item.description: One of the great things about Concourse is the resource abstraction it gives you for defining inputs and outputs to jobs in a pipeline. This abstraction allows you to redefine a resource while leaving the job that uses the resource unmodified. For example, if I have a resource, my-source-code, that normally is provided via a git resource: resources: - name: my-source-code type: git source: uri: git@example.com/some-owner/some-repo.git I can change that resource to be provided by S3 instead by changing the resource definition:
